intro: Phyllanthus dongmoensis, commonly known as the Dongmoensis Phyllanthus, is a species of flowering plant native to Cameroon. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its small, clustered leaves and yellowish flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, forested areas and is often found in the understory of tropical rainforests. It has a compact growth habit with a short stem and is known for its medicinal properties in traditional African medicine.
